name: IRFTS - Institut de Recherche Fondamenta
description:
IRFTS  is an engineering and research company focused on solar technologies and applications.
Based in France, IRFTS aims at easing the access to the solar technologies by inventing and manufacturing new solar systems for roofs, ground mounted or stand alone systems worldwide. 
IRFTS is the inventor of EASY ROOF concept, a revolutionary in roof mounting system.

product_images.title: EASY ROOF : in roof mounting system for PV modules
product_images.description:
THE CONCEPT :

Thanks to an ingenious patented interlocking process, the various parts of the EASY ROOF fit perfectly together, without cutting into each other like a LEGO ™ kit and are ideal for various types of roofs :

Residential, commercial, industrial and public buildings, farms.

ADVANTAGES :

FULLY ADJUSTABLE

- "Single frame" solution for adjustable assemblies from 0.2 KW to several MW
- Each module can be replaced separately
- Installation formats: portrait, pyramid or free (contour of window ...)

EASY TO CARRY :

- Weight (2.5 kg) and not bulky

EASY TO INSTALL :

- Installation without any cutting needed
- Installation time: 6 hours for a 3KW installation (2 layers)

RELIABILITY :

- Installation without sealing
- Fits all roofs, even distorted, with slopes from 10° to 50°
- UV, hail, rust, heat, snow and wind resistant
    (valid for zone 4: snow and wind according to NV-65 and Eurocode standards)
- Vents under each module: optimised energy efficiency

NICE LOOK :

- Side brackets and fixing clamps : aluminium or black finish

RECYCLING :

- 100% recyclable
